title: Feature: Navigate to the "Stadium Brick Locator" page, via deep linking*
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the website
custom_steps: When the user Deep links to mets brick locator
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the 
"Mets Stadium Brick Locator" page

title: Feature:  Verify Header and sub header for brick locator page
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected:
Then the user must  see 
 "Citi Field Brick Locator" header
 "Use this map to find your brick at Citi Field!" sub-head
And instructional text

title: Feature:  Verify web elements for brick locator page
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected:
Then the user must  see 
   "First Name" field
   And a "Last Name" field
   And an "Inscription Text" field
   And an Inscription number Field
   And a "Cancel" button
   And a "Find My Brick" button
   And a static map of the stadium

title: Feature:  Stadium Standard  Footer
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on "Mets Brick Locator" Page
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected: Then the user sees the NY Mets stadium footer

title: Feature:  Verify fields after search
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid text "John" in the "First Name" field
   And clicks the "Find My Brick" button
custom_expected:
Then a search displays a grid of 5 columns 
   - First name
   - Last name
   - Section
   - Brick Size
   - Inscription

title: Feature:  User triggers a search return using first name
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page

title: Feature:  User triggers a search using last name
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid text "Maravi" in the "Last Name" field
   And clicks the "Find My Brick" button
custom_expected: Then a search returns Last Name "Maravi" as search results

title: Feature:  User triggers a search using Inscription text field
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid text "LET'S GO METS! ROBERT & JASON SACKOOR" in the "Inscription Text"
field
   And clicks the "Find My Brick" button
custom_expected: Then a search return Inscription Text "LET'S GO METS! ROBERT & JASON SACKOOR" as search results

title: Feature:  Load More Test (Mobile Only)
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid text "{provided Inscription number}" in the "Inscription Number"
field
   And clicks the "Find My Brick" button
custom_expected:
Then the user sees Load More.
When user selects Load More
Then More results are loaded

title: Feature:  User tries to trigger a search with no search input (negative scenario)
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: When the user does not enter text in any of the fields
custom_expected: Then an "Find my Brick" button is disabled

title: Feature:  Brick Section maps columns
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected: Then the user can see the all bricks section maps for citi field stadium

title: Feature:  Brick Section maps details
custom_preconds:
Given:  User is on "Mets Brick Locator" Page 
and Search for "John" in first name
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a more detailed section
map that opens in a new tab

title: Feature:  Pagination is displayed(Desktop Only)
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on "Mets Brick Locator" Page and Search for "John" in first name
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page

title: Feature:  Pagination works(Desktop Only)
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on "Mets Brick Locator" Page and Search for "John" in first name
custom_steps: When the user selects pagination page 2

title: Feature:  "Number of  Records" displayed*
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on "Mets Brick Locator" Page and Search for "John" in first name
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected: Then the user sees "Number of Records" is displayed

title: Feature:  Verify Ads for brick locator page
custom_preconds: Given:  User is on the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_steps: When the user views the "Mets Brick Locator" page
custom_expected: Then the user must  see Ads

title: Feature: API Test
custom_steps: When we make a get request to BRICK_API
